titleStmt.title: A decree of Starre-Chamber, concerning printing made the eleuenth day of Iuly last past. 1637.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Star Chamber.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" in part of a woodcut.
This edition has the royal arms on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
